channel.title: Beginner that needs help please?
channel.description: Alrighty so as the title suggests i'm a beginner and i barely know what i am doing but i need some help, Alrighty so my 1st Problem, i have dled a client and got it online using no-ip and stuff, so then i needed to make it a jar file so my friend could get on or whatever, so i dled JAR Maker and it took me like 5 tries but i finally got it to jar, but i think in the process i messed something up because now with every jarred client (even ones that aren't mine that worked perfectly fine before i did the JAR Maker thing) when i double click it it says: "Error: Could not find or load main class C:\Users\Kelly\Desktop\US2Launcher.jar (as you can see i am trying to open UltimateScape's jar which isnt the one im working on obviously) but if i right click is and click Open With then Java(TM) Platform SE Binary it loads right up, no problems, so obviously i messed something up somewhere does anyone know how to fix this? Also now hat i have made the Jar for the server i am attempting to work on, i sent the jar file to my friend and when he tries to open it he gets a error that say's: Java Virtual Machine Loader: A Java Exception has occured. On my computer when i try to open up my jarred file it does the same thing as mentioned above, but when i right click it and run with java, it works, so yeah i've got something messed up..:/ MY 2nd problem, I am trying to use Eclipse to help me with my server coding and stuff, but when i try to run my server through Eclipse i get to the part where you Run Configurations\Java Application\new, then i name my thing or whatever but when i click on search under Main Class, nothing comes up, on tutorials i've watched you have to find server.Server and when they click search they have a list of things that pop up but absolutely nothing comes up on mine, i was wondering what was up with that, i was thinking maybe that is linked to my jar files acting funny also, like maybe i didnt get some type of file when i dled this server? idk, im sorry for the essay and im not even sure if this goes here tbh but i need help, someone might be able to help me that would be amazing, Thanks Everyone. -Skullbandit

item.title: Beginner that needs help please?
item.dc:creator: @Skullbandit Skullbandit
item.description:
@Skullbandit wrote:

Alrighty so as the title suggests i’m a beginner and i barely know what i am doing but i need some help, Alrighty so my 1st Problem, i have dled a client and got it online using no-ip and stuff, so then i needed to make it a jar file so my friend could get on or whatever, so i dled JAR Maker and it took me like 5 tries but i finally got it to jar, but i think in the process i messed something up because now with every jarred client (even ones that aren’t mine that worked perfectly fine before i did the JAR Maker thing) when i double click it it says: "Error: Could not find or load main class C:\Users\Kelly\Desktop\US2Launcher.jar (as you can see i am trying to open UltimateScape’s jar which isnt the one im working on obviously) but if i right click is and click Open With then Java™ Platform SE Binary it loads right up, no problems, so obviously i messed something up somewhere does anyone know how to fix this? Also now hat i have made the Jar for the server i am attempting to work on, i sent the jar file to my friend and when he tries to open it he gets a error that say’s: Java Virtual Machine Loader: A Java Exception has occured. On my computer when i try to open up my jarred file it does the same thing as mentioned above, but when i right click it and run with java, it works, so yeah i’ve got something messed up…
MY 2nd problem, I am trying to use Eclipse to help me with my server coding and stuff, but when i try to run my server through Eclipse i get to the part where you Run Configurations\Java Application\new, then i name my thing or whatever but when i click on search under Main Class, nothing comes up, on tutorials i’ve watched you have to find server.Server and when they click search they have a list of things that pop up but absolutely nothing comes up on mine, i was wondering what was up with that, i was thinking maybe that is linked to my jar files acting funny also, like maybe i didnt get some type of file when i dled this server? idk, im sorry for the essay and im not even sure if this goes here tbh but i need help, someone might be able to help me that would be amazing, Thanks Everyone.
-Skullbandit
